conventions.system: System-owned, canonical data used across many tests (e.g., dedicated Salesforce users). Safe to assume exists. Should not be casually overwritten. Keys MUST start with `system.`
conventions.test: Test-owned data created or used during test execution. Safe to overwrite. May be reused across tests but is not guaranteed to exist long-term. Keys MUST start with `test.`

_meta.description: System-owned Salesforce test users used across many tests (e.g., Admin, Sales, Account Manager). These users are assumed to exist and should not be casually overwritten. Store non-secrets here (e.g., username/email). Passwords/tokens belong in env/ADO secrets.
